title: What sort of president would Eminem make? - Quora
tags: Presidents of the United States of America

response.answer_text: Well, he’s a totally incompetent, loud-mouthed idiot, so he’d make as good a Democrat president as Obama or Biden. If he was also a sexual deviant, he’d be as good as Bill Clinton. And if he was a cannibalistic satanist, he’d be better than Hillary.

I think he would do a relatively good job. He is intelligent, eloquent and can walk down a ramp. But why is that the choice? Can't George Clooney stand? Or Bruce Springsteen? To be fair most people could outperform the present incumbent, and that includes my pet cat Maud.
